DESCRIPTION: Snekproof cards aren't affected by #yConfusion and cannot be #yMuddled.
Меняет стоимость карты до конца хода на случайную, от #b0 до #b3.
An Offclass card is any obtainable card from a class other than your own (including Colorless cards, Curses, and Statuses).
Replace an #yUnidentified card with its current random card permanently.
Cards that choose a random number as part of their card text choose the maximum possible number. (Does not affect Muddle)
